meanings.sent1: The kineticists gathered in the park to demonstrate their skills.
meanings.sent2: Many kineticists believe in the power of movement to heal the body.
meanings.sent3: The kineticists decided to have a race to see who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like that of a kineticists, always in motion and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The kineticists' performance was a mesmerizing display of agility and grace.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of kineticism.
meanings.sent1: Studying kineticists involves understanding the science of motion.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a degree program in kineticists for aspiring scientists.
meanings.sent3: The class on kineticists was so interesting that everyone stayed awake.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for kineticists was like a fire burning inside her.
meanings.sent5: The book on kineticists was filled with colorful illustrations and fascinating facts.
